column4: Is there a problem that i use Ubuntu 10.04 LTS even after releasing 10.10 and more non-LTS Releases ? Will i get all software, libraries, .. on my system updated while using it ?
you will get security updates and bug fixes, don't expect the "newest" version of everything though
No problem for that, but what if I want to install some new version that depends on a new version of some library, Would I have to update that library manually ?
you are misunderstanding the purpose of LTS: it is for stability and for situations where you don't want to change things a lot
